    if ( document.getElementById )
      elem = document.getElementById( id );

      elem = eval( "document.all." + id );
    else

      <h3 class="section-bar">Public Class methods</h3>

      <div id="method-M000135" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000135"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Thumbnail.src/M000135.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Thumbnail.src/M000135.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">new</span><span class="method-args">(file, options = {})</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Creates a Thumbnail object set to work on the file given. It will attempt to transform the image into one defined by target_geometry which is a &quot;WxH&quot;-style string. format will be inferred from the file unless specified. Thumbnail creation will raise no errors unless whiny is true (which it is, by default. If convert_options is set, the options will be appended to the convert command upon image conversion 

        </div>
      </div>
